description: A relationship between a person and an organization
title: Membership

___person_id.description: The ID of the person who is a party to the relationship

___post.description: The post held by the person in the organization through this membership

___links.description: URLs to documents about the membership

___end_date.description: The date on which the relationship ended

___role.description: The role that the holder of the post fulfills

___organization.description: The organization that is a party to the relationship

___contact_details.description: Means of contacting the person who is a party to the relationship

___start_date.description: The date on which the relationship began

___organization_id.description: The ID of the organization that is a party to the relationship

___person.description: The person who is a party to the relationship

___post_id.description: The ID of the post held by the person in the organization through this membership
